sales_shipment.description: This table contains information about shipments for orders

data.description: The primary key of the table, unique identifier for each shipment.
Identifier for the order to which this shipment is associated.
Identifier for the store where the order was placed.
Total weight of the shipment.
Total quantity of items in the shipment.
Flag indicating if a shipment email was sent to the customer.
Flag indicating if an email should be sent for this shipment.
The status of the shipment (e.g., pending, shipped, canceled).
Unique sequential shipment identifier.
Date and time when the shipment was created.
Date and time when the shipment was last updated.
Information about packages included in the shipment.
Identifier for the shipping address associated with the shipment.
Identifier for the billing address associated with the shipment.
Unique identifier for the shipment.
Identifier for the customer who placed the order.
Name of the customer who placed the order.
Email address of the customer who placed the order.
Description of the shipping method used for the shipment.
Shipping amount for the shipment.
Base shipping amount for the shipment.
Tax amount for shipping on the shipment.
Base tax amount for shipping on the shipment.
Code for the carrier used for the shipment.
Tracking number for the shipment.
Label for the status of the shipment.
Unit of measurement for the weight of the shipment.
Base currency code for the shipment.
Currency code for the order associated with the shipment.
Currency code for the store where the order was placed.
Collection of items included in the shipment.
